Ron Cephas Jones (born January 8, 1957), sometimes credited as Ron C. Jones, is an American actor. His movie roles include "He Got Game" (1998), "Sweet and Lowdown" (1999), "Half Nelson" (2006), and "Across The Universe" (2007).
Jones has performed stage roles with the Steppenwolf Theatre Company in Chicago, Illinois. He currently stars on the NBC dramedy series "This Is Us" as William Hill.
